ja: 僕の直属の上司は気難しい。

en: If you follow my advice, you will have no trouble.
ja: 僕の忠告に従えば問題は起こらないよ。

en: I hope you'll come to my birthday party.

en: That isn't what I'm looking for.

en: I am not responsible to you for my blunder.

en: Walk ahead of me.

en: I have twice as many books as he.

en: Two boys stood in front of me.

en: My predecessors had asked their questions of nature with genuine curiosity and awaited her reply.
ja: 僕の先輩たちは、純粋な好奇心を抱いて自分たちの疑問を自然に問いかけ、自然が答えるのを待った。

en: Can you hear I'm calling?
